price: He said, “My Lord, help me against people who spread corruption.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
